entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022
